name: Lens photo app
tagline: A desktop photo app, created for a tutorial on Scotch.io
body: # lens-photo-app A desktop photo app, created for a tutorial on Scotch.io Installation --- Make sure that you have Node.js installed, and the following global npm dependencies: - nw - nw-builder You can install these globally with the following command: npm install -g nw nw-builder Next, after checking out the repo, change directory into it, and run the following command: npm install Next, run NW.js on it: nw
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
